channel.title: Sleep? Or Timer?
channel.description:
Hey, i was wondering if someone could help me..
How would i add a sleep, or a timer into my blitz, to make the gfx cast first.. Then the hit?..
I tried something like.. [code] public int MageWait = 2; [/code]
Then in my blitz spell, i added, between the Gfx, and the hitDiff.. [code] Thread.sleep(MageWait); [/code]
Now i think thats terribly wrong :\..
Anyone got any ideas :S?

item.title: Sleep? Or Timer?
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

why not just change pk delay a little higher, then take action timer a lil lower then the pk delay. then it does the action then the attack…

so, for blitz it would…

does your set Gfx
waits the time in between the action delay and pk delay
acualy casts the spell without the gfx

Read full topic

item.title: Sleep? Or Timer?

item.description:
